name: GUTTERPUNK
description: Welcome to Gutterpunk, a fast-paced twin-stick shooter set in a dystopian cyberpunk city. Go on a rampage, wiping out the gangsters terrorizing the city! Keep your adrenaline high or end up flatlined on the streets! The controls are simple, WASD to move, Mouse 1 to fire, when you kill an enemy you take their gun. Get out there and clean up those streets, Gutterpunk!
